INTRODUCTIONCHAPTER 1 – INTRODUCTIONA.	PURPOSEThe United States Trustee appoints and supervises standing trustees and monitors and supervises cases under chapter 13 of title 11 of the United States Code.  28 U.S.C. § 586(b).  The Handbook, issued as part of our duties under 28 U.S.C. § 586, establishes or clarifies the position of the United States Trustee Program (Program) on the duties owed by a standing trustee to the debtors, creditors, other parties in interest, and the United States Trustee.
